feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
